summary: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.
cast: Piper Perabo|Manolo Cardona|Jamie Lee Curtis|José María Yazpik|Maury Sterling|Jesús Ochoa|Eugenio Derbez|Omar Leyva|Naomy Romo|Ali Hillis|Marguerite Moreau|Nick Zano|Carmen Vera|Gina Gallego|Hiram Vilchez|Alberto Reyes|Enrique Chavero|Andrés Pardave|Juan Carlos Martín|Juan Antonio Saldaña|Sal Lopez|Giovanna Acha Aleman|Fernando Manzano|Randall England|Claudia Cervantes|Lilly Lange|Brandon Keener|Jack Plotnick|Mary Paz Mata|Mayra Serbulo|Mon de León|Berenice Romero|Antonio Infante|Tomihuatzi Xelhuantzin|Erick Cañete|David Goldsmith|Julie Claire|Holly Bonelli|Drew Barrymore|Andy Garcia|George Lopez|Cheech Marin|Paul Rodriguez|Plácido Domingo|Edward James Olmos|Loretta Devine|Michael Urie|Luis Guzmán|Eddie 'Piolin' Sotelo|Carlos Juvera|Zeus Mendoza|Lombardo Boyar|Jon Molerio|Margo Rey|Lisa Marie Quillinan|Ed Francis Martin|Grey Griffin|Axel Alba|Rafael Petardi|Angel|Ahcitz Azcona|James Bannon|James P. Bennett|Tara Cardinal|Ethynn Tanner Cerney|Mercedes Connor|Finnegan the Dog|Sean Edwards|Mike Faiola|Holly Fields|Elisa Gabrielli|Dennis Garr|Jordan Jones|Christopher Maleki|Leslie Mann|Sebestien Soliz|Jerome Villaluz|John A. title: Un chihuahua en Beverly Hills
